name: Reservation
description: A lock on a message that prevents another client from retrieving the message for a short duration.

properties.description: A unique, API-generated identifier for this resource.
A unique, API-generated identifier that points to the message this reservation is locking.
The amount of time this reservation lasts before the lock on the message will be released.

interactions.description: Release a reservation, removing the lock on the message prematurely.
Reserve a message, creating a lock on it that will prevent other clients from retrieving it for a short duration.
Extend the timeout on a message, delaying its automatic expiration.
Retrieve the message and reservation information again.
Retrieve a log of past reservations for the given message.

params.description: The maximum number of reservations to return.
